item.description:
If you want to be one of the ten contestants please mail your entry to fatcatu2@aol.com with "grill off" in the subject line. The first ten entries received will be the contestants.

The celebrity judges and Paul will begin their judging at 6:00 PM and the trophy and title of BFD Grill Master Extraordinar 2011 will be awarded at around 9:00 PM. 

If you just want to come party then sign us as usual, bring food already prepared this time, and drink to share.

The rules and other details will be posted in the next week or so give or take.

 

You don't want to miss this one!
item.how_to_find_us: I will send the address a few days before the event PLEASE DO NOT USE THE MEETUP MAP
item.name: The 2nd Annual Great Big Over-The-Top Summertime Grilloff
